posts.post_title: Pending: 1911 T212 Obak Buck Weaver SGC 1.5
posts.post_content:
-
1911 T212 Obak Buck Weaver SGC 1.5

Collector grade and one of the key cards of the set.  Presents nicely with a horizontal crease at the bottom third but does not take away from the image.  Stamped back as many Obaks are.  

Pending  pp/ff includes priority shipping via the local Best Western Plus (too soon?). 

"I'll take it" supersedes negotiations.

Please pm with any questions and thanks for looking.

Edit:  would also consider trade for a clean E100 plus cash.
